SectionBody.Text: If it appears from the annual guardianship report that:

Subsection.Text: The condition of the ward requires further examination;
Any change in the proposed care, maintenance, or treatment is needed;
The ward is qualified for restoration of some or all rights;
The condition or maintenance of the ward requires the performance or doing of any other thing for the best interest of the ward which is not indicated in the plan; or
There is any other matter necessary to protect the interests of the ward,

SectionBody.Text: the court shall, after a hearing with appropriate notice, amend the plan or enter any other order necessary to protect the ward.
